prTitle: feat: implement accessibility and responsive utility classes
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented comprehensive accessibility and responsive utility classes for the donkey website CSS foundation. This establishes the utility layer needed for proper accessibility compliance and responsive design throughout the application.

### Accessibility Utilities (src/styles/utilities/accessibility.css)

- **Screen Reader Utilities**: `.sr-only` and `.sr-only-focusable` for hiding content visually while keeping it accessible to assistive technologies
- **Skip Links**: `.skip-link` utility for keyboard navigation with WCAG-compliant focus styles
- **Focus Management**: Comprehensive focus utilities with 3:1 contrast ratio compliance and support for high contrast mode
- **ARIA Support**: Utilities for live regions, focus traps, and proper state indicators
- **Accessibility Features**: Support for reduced motion, high contrast mode, and text scaling up to 200%

### Responsive Utilities (src/styles/utilities/responsive.css)

- **Visibility Controls**: Show/hide utilities for mobile-only, tablet+, desktop+, and wide screen breakpoints
- **Display Utilities**: Responsive display type controls (block, flex, grid, etc.) at different breakpoints
- **Spacing System**: Comprehensive margin and padding utilities with responsive variants using CSS custom properties
- **Container System**: Responsive container with proper max-widths and padding for different screen sizes
- **Layout Helpers**: Text alignment, width utilities, and responsive layout controls

### Technical Details

- **Mobile-First Design**: All utilities follow mobile-first responsive approach
- **CSS Custom Properties**: Extensive use of CSS variables for theming and consistency
- **WCAG 2.1 Level AA Compliance**: Focus indicators, contrast ratios, and accessibility features meet standards
- **Breakpoints**: 768px (tablet), 1024px (desktop), 1200px (wide) following project specifications
- **Performance Optimized**: Utilities designed for efficient CSS delivery and minimal specificity conflicts

### Files Modified

- `src/styles/utilities/accessibility.css` (new) - 248 lines of accessibility utilities
- `src/styles/utilities/responsive.css` (new) - 419 lines of responsive utilities

Closes #16
